mod-setting-name.module_inserter_close_after_load: Close GUI after loading a preset

mod-setting-description.module_inserter_proxies_per_tick: How many item requests to create per tick\nLower = less lag
mod-setting-description.module_inserter_fill_all: Fill all available slots when selecting the module in the first slot\n(Will only fill empty slots)
mod-setting-description.module_inserter_hide_button: Hides the button in the top left corner.\n__ALT_CONTROL__1__open-item__ on a Module Inserter or press __CONTROL__toggle-module-inserter__ to open.
